entry.title: Make sure to leave a comment and tell me what edit you like the most. Also don’t be afraid to ask anything about #databending which is the process of manipulating a media file of a certain format, using software designed to edit files of another format #a
entry.content: Make sure to leave a comment and tell me what edit you like the most. Also don’t be afraid to ask anything about #databending which is the process of manipulating a media file of a certain format, using software designed to edit files of another format #a
